trans-unit.source: Represents a proposed addition of an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> to a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity" /> within a running workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma adição proposta de um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> para um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity" /> dentro de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho em execução.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.AddedActivityAction" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.AddedActivityAction" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.AddedActivityAction" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.AddedActivityAction" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity" /> that the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.AddedActivityAction" /> is based on.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity" /> na qual a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.AddedActivityAction" /> é baseada.
A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> adicionada ao fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.AddedActivityAction" /> class by using a specified activity and composite activity.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.AddedActivityAction" /> usando uma atividade especificada e uma atividade de composição.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="compositeActivity" /> or <paramref name="activityAdded" /> are a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="compositeActivity" /> ou <paramref name="activityAdded" /> é uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> added to the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> adicionada ao fluxo de trabalho.
A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> adicionada ao fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the added <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> with the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities" /> collection of the parent <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o índice da <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> adicionada com a coleção <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities" /> do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity" /> pai.

trans-unit.source: The index value of the new <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor de índice do novo <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
